name: KacaoX®
description: KacaoX® represents a unique blend of cocoa antioxidants and cocoa soluble dietary fiber in a stable water soluble form for colloidal dispersion in the gut for better absorption. Various grades of cocoa antioxidant extracts suitable for functional food/diary/sachet/chocolate applications are available under the brand KocaoX™. Cocoa beans form a panacea of antioxidant flavonoids, bioavailable procyanidin oligomers, and prebiotics responsible for a wide range of health benefits, comprising cardio protective, neuroprotective and cosmetic effects.
